name: Find A Tape
description:
Find a Tape is a short story divided on 7 chapters with unique endings. Collect all 7 tapes, upgrade your character, unlock weapons and choose your style of playing. Remember every time you lose, you gain more experience, but the same chapter is different!

I'm looking forward to release it on steam and google play.

My very first 2D game in unity. I hope that will bring you lots of fun :D
